about_the_game:
A tactical multiplayer FPS from Epic Games vets.

Join up for rapid-fire 1v1 duels and squad PvP warfare with your band of Kawaii killers from Delta Force, SAS, and beyond. Storm the Y2K inspired FPS arena through tight, pulse-pounding gunfights.

Swear your allegiance to WTF and sign the dotted line for exclusive Pre-Alpha Access!

Kawaii Killers

Join the Discord server to apply for pre-alpha testing, follow development updates, and team up to dominate the arena with the grace of battle-hardened kunoichi.

No sweats, just ~vibes~

  • Diverse cast of anime-inspired characters, each with their own tragic backstory (probably)

  • Frenzied 1v1 to 4v4 matches that'll keep you lost in adrenaline-soaked gunfights

  • An arsenal of customizable weapons inspired by battle-hardened manga

  • Fluid and aggressive movement system and colorful, anime-inspired maps designed for non-stop action

  • Stunning visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, bringing your tsundere maidens dreams to life

Lock & Load (◕ᗜ◕)

WTF Bro? Eyes front for the hot zone with your kawaii mercenaries across manga-inspired PvP arenas! Slash and clash as SF operators in brutal, high-stakes gunfights in the near future of 1999. Guns, girls, and global domination – what more could you want? Sign-Up for the ultimate kawaii arena shooter Pre-Alpha today!

Sign up at the website or Discord for early playtests!

Lead us into battle Taichou! Join the WTF Pre-Alpha today!

name: Waifu Tactical Force

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560,Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Kawaii aesthetics and tactical FPS action in Y2K arenas with matches that last mere minutes. Get your adrenaline kick with guns, girls, and global domination – what more could you want?
